contentList.content: You subscribe to a philosophy that seeks to understand the nature of the planes or some hidden truth of the multiverse. You draw strength from your conviction. In your travels, emancipated from the factions of Sigil, you explore the depths of your understanding and spread your philosophy wherever you go.

You spent a significant amount of time somewhere influenced by intense planar forces or a portal to another plane of existence. You’re accustomed to experiences that would leave others reeling in terror or enraptured by otherworldly beauty, and you’re comfortable dealing with Celestials and Fiends.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Arcana">Arcana</LSTag> and, regarding your distance from the factions of Sigil, <LSTag Tooltip="Investigation">Investigation</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Survival">Survival</LSTag>.
Your connection to an Outer Plane infuses you with its energies and you gain an appropriate cantrip.
Your connection to Chaotic Outer Plane infuses you with a Poison <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and give you the minor spell <LSTag Tooltip="MinorIllusion">Minor illusion</LSTag>.

Your connection to Evil Outer Plane infuses you with a Necrotic <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and give you the minor spell <LSTag Tooltip="ChillTouch">Chill touch</LSTag> (also known as <LSTag Tooltip="ChillTouch">Bone chill</LSTag>).
Your connection to Good Outer Plane infuses you with a Radiant <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and give you the minor spell <LSTag Tooltip="SacredFlame">Sacred flame</LSTag>.
Your connection to Lawful Outer Plane infuses you with a Force <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and give you the minor spell <LSTag Tooltip="Guidance">Guidance</LSTag>.
Your connection to Outlands infuses you with a Psychic <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and give you the minor spell <LSTag Tooltip="MageHand">Mage hand</LSTag>.
You can draw on the forces of the multiverse to survive cosmic extremes and you assert yourself as a true expert in planar portals.

With your experience of planar travel, you gain an Acid <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and the spell <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_PortalCracker">Portal cracker</LSTag> to create 2 portals one time per short rest.

With your experience of planar travel, you gain a Cold <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and the spell <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_PortalCracker">Portal cracker</LSTag> to create 2 portals one time per short rest.

With your experience of planar travel, you gain a Fire <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and the spell <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_PortalCracker">Portal Cracker</LSTag> to create 2 portals one time per short rest.

You can channel cosmic forces of Order to gain benefits. You gain the force reaction <LSTag Tooltip="Interrupt_Paitm_StasisStrike">Stasis Strike</LSTag> to deal additional Force damage with a Restrain chance.

You can channel cosmic forces of Evil to gain benefits. You gain the necrotic reaction <LSTag Tooltip="Interrupt_Paitm_GraspOfAvarice">Grasp of Avarice</LSTag> to deal additional Necrotic damage and Heal yourself.

You can channel cosmic forces of Chaos to gain benefits. You gain the reaction <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_ChaoticFlare">Chaotic flare</LSTag> to gain chaotic powers on Critical Miss and Critical Hit attacks.

You have spent significant time in the Outlands, being steeped in converging planar energies grants you benefits. You gain a planar <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> spell to teleport and a <LSTag Tooltip="Paitm_Tongues">Tongues</LSTag> spell for conversations one time per short rest.

You can channel cosmic forces of Good to gain benefits. You gain the protective reaction <LSTag Tooltip="Interrupt_Paitm_SoothePain">Soothe Pain</LSTag> to try to reduce the damage suffered by you or an ally.
You can channel specific cosmic forces to gain benefits and you increase one Ability by 1 to a maximum of 20.
Surrounded by planar energies, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
Your experience with portals allows you to open two linked portals without the need to concentrate. When casting the spell, instability may occur and inflict Psychic damage on the caster.
At the end of your turn, roll a d20. On 11 or higher, you vanish into another plane. While there, you can't be harmed or seen in this world.
When you do vanish, your presence here is a representation of the location you'll come back to. You can choose to teleport it up to [1].
Conjure a flare of chaotic energy.
Once per turn, when you damage a creature, you can also deal necrotic damage to it. The necrotic damage equals 1d6, and you regain 1d6 hit points.
As a Baleful Scion, once per turn, if you damage a creature you can also deal an additional [1] and you regain [2].
As an Agent of Order, once per turn, if you damage a creature you can also deal an additional [1] and, if lucky, restrain it.
As a Righteous Heritor, once per turn, you can use this reaction and try to reduce damage suffered by you or an ally for the current turn.
Cosmic forces of Good gave you a temporary protection to reduce damage suffered.
Cosmic forces of Order prevent you from moving.

You sense the presence of planar energies, like portals, even the most residual. Additionally, you gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana. The spell ends when you detect a portal and obtain information about that portal.

You sense the presence of planar energies, like portals, even the most residual. Additionally, you gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana. The spell ends when you detect a portal and obtain information about that portal.

You sense the presence of planar energies, like portals, even the most residual. Additionally, you gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana. The spell ends when you detect a portal and obtain information about that portal.

You sense the presence of planar energies, like portals, even the most residual. Additionally, you gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana. The spell ends when you detect a portal and obtain information about that portal.
Your brain's understanding goes up a notch, whether in terms of logic or language. For a little while you become better at conversations with all types of people.
The understanding of your target goes up a notch, whether in terms of logic or language. For a little while your target become better at conversations with all types of people.
You are better at conversations with all types of people.
Cosmic forces of Chaos fill you with a reckless fury. You gain advantage on attack rolls and disadvantage on ability checks.
Cosmic forces of Chaos ripple waves of energy around you. This effect damages nearby creatures.
Cosmic forces of Chaos allow you to teleport.
Cosmic forces of Chaos affects the Wisdom saving throws of entities surrounding the aura.
Cosmic forces of Chaos allow you to teleport.
As an Agent of Chaos, on a Critical Hit or Critical Miss attack roll, you can randomly gain a chaotic effect for the current turn.
As an Agent of Chaos, on an attack roll, you can randomly gain a chaotic effect for the current turn.
As an Agent of Chaos, on an attack roll, you can randomly gain a chaotic effect for the current turn.
Cosmic forces of Chaos ripple waves of energy around you. This effect damages nearby creatures.
Cosmic forces of Chaos affects the Wisdom saving throws of entities surrounding the aura.
Cosmic forces of Chaos assail entities surrounding the aura.
Cosmic forces of Chaos assail entities surrounding the aura.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.
You fortify the fabric of the planes, which prevents your targets from casting most teleportation or portal spells.

This small, smooth stone contains the essence of a single experience. You can throw the stone, breaking it in the process, to end the charmed or frightened condition on someone. Or you can touch and consume the stone and experience the sensation yourself.
Beat Oliver at hide and seek without alerting the shadow creatures.
Protect Halsin's portal while he saves the spirit of the land.
I Ain't Afraid of No Shadows
Traverse through the Shadow-Cursed Lands to Last Light and Moonrise without using a Moonlantern.
Complete the Gauntlet of Shar without going to Last Light or Moonrise.
Conquer three combat encounters in the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Explore each key area of the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Survive two rounds of the shadow curse.
Take a full Long Rest in the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Always a Step Ahead of the Darkness
Reach Nightsong without having been affected by the shadow curse.
Enter a restricted area in Moonrise Towers from the outside.
Successfully drink and resist the negative effects of the brewer's concoction.
Enter the oubliette... for better or for worse.
Explore all sections of the mind flayer colony.
Give raw goods as a donation.
Release all the imprisoned circus beasts.
Tame the dilophosaurus, making it non-hostile towards you.
Blow up the Steel Watch Foundry.
Find all the pieces of Dribbles' body and return them to Lucretious.
Travel through the House of Hope portal.
Obtain room and board at the Elfsong Tavern.
Discover the fate of the githyanki egg.
Survive the Bhaalist ambush at the park.
Convince Jaheira to let her family stay in the city.
Survive the bandits' rolling boulder trap.
Take an item from the Carrion Crawler nest.
See past the illusion covering the swamp.
Discover the curse of Yeenoghu and destroy his hyenas.
Enter the Underdark through the bottomless well.
Secure the pouch from the spider crevice.
Destroy each kind of hazardous Underdark mushroom.
Steal from the giant bird's nest in the Underdark.
Defeat the Lava Elemental in the lava lake.
Beat Oliver at hide and seek without alerting the shadow creatures.
Protect Halsin's portal while he saves the spirit of the land.
I Ain't Afraid of No Shadows
Traverse through the Shadow-Cursed Lands to Last Light and Moonrise without using a Moonlantern.
Complete the Gauntlet of Shar without going to Last Light or Moonrise.
Conquer three combat encounters in the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Explore each key area of the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Survive two rounds of the shadow curse.
Take a full Long Rest in the Shadow-Cursed Lands.
Always a Step Ahead of the Darkness
Reach Nightsong without having been affected by the shadow curse.
Enter a restricted area in Moonrise Towers from the outside.
Successfully drink and resist the negative effects of the brewer's concoction.
Enter the oubliette... for better or for worse.
Explore all sections of the mind flayer colony.
Give raw goods as a donation.
Release all the imprisoned circus beasts.
Tame the dilophosaurus, making it non-hostile towards you.
Blow up the Steel Watch Foundry.
Find all the pieces of Dribbles' body and return them to Lucretious.
Travel through the House of Hope portal.
Obtain room and board at the Elfsong Tavern.
Discover the fate of the githyanki egg.
Survive the Bhaalist ambush at the park.
Convince Jaheira to let her family stay in the city.
Survive the bandits' rolling boulder trap.
Take an item from the Carrion Crawler nest.
See past the illusion covering the swamp.
Discover the curse of Yeenoghu and destroy his hyenas.
Enter the Underdark through the bottomless well.
Secure the pouch from the spider crevice.
Destroy each kind of hazardous Underdark mushroom.
Steal from the giant bird's nest in the Underdark.
Defeat the Lava Elemental in the lava lake.
This portable arcane instrument seems old, worn and imprecise. This item does not seem to come from the Sword Coast.
This old skull-shaped device is filled with knowledge.
This small, smooth stone contains the essence of a single experience. You can touch and consume the stone and experience the sensation yourself.
This small, smooth stone contains the essence of a single experience. You can touch and consume the stone and experience the sensation yourself.
Try to safely cast Portal Cracker.
This old inanimate skull-shaped device is filled with knowledge.
Having this item in inventory grants you its magical effect.
You gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana and Perception.
You gain a Proficienty bonus in Arcana and Perception.
Activate the Mimir and absorb its knowledge.

For those independent of mind and thought, who does not refer to any god. We often see this way of thinking among residents of Sigil. With a class like Cleric, a godless character can gain powers from their own convictions and principles.
Connected with planar energies to its duplicate, this gate allows those who walk through to emerge from its twin gate.
You remember strange places and strange times. It seems that you are not the only "you" in the multiverse. As an anomaly, other incarnations sometimes appear giving you bonuses.
You are an anomaly in the multiverse. Sometimes other versions of you melt with your existence.
A glitched incarnation appears on a cast.
A glitched incarnation appears on an attack.
A glitched incarnation appears on a rest.
Focus and try to recall your main incarnation.
A glitched incarnation appears on an attack.
A glitched incarnation appears on a cast.
Sometimes other versions of you melt with you during an attack.
Sometimes other versions of you melt with you during a cast.
This old Mimir wants to wake up and talk.
This old Mimir wants to wake up and talk.
Who are you ? It seems that you were inert for a while before I found you.
You know, sometimes, I sure miss having a body.
I am both happy and completely miserable.
It's ok, it's just that I have a strange feeling about you.
Yes don't worry, see you later.
You know, sometimes, I sure miss having a body.
I am both happy and completely miserable.
You know, sometimes I sure miss having a body.
I am both happy and completely miserable.
Me? I'm the head of Vecna.
We should get some female zombies to join this party.
Can't wait to continue being a floating skull for the rest of eternity.
Thanks for reactivating me Chief, can't wait to go out and party.
This sword was the weapon of choice of a famous githzerai working for a creature known as the 'Nameless One'.
A planar contract to hire a member of the Society of Sensation.
A planar contract to hire a member of the Society of Sensation.
What can change the nature of a man?
I do not think we know each other well enough.
Through observation, sensation and experience, the truth of the multiverse should be revealed.
It's good to be journeying again! The brothel was a learning experience, but I think it was time I moved on.
A planar contract to hire a thief scavenger from Sigil.
A planar contract to hire a thief scavenger from Sigil.
Accent? What are ye on about?
Touch my blades again, and I'll put them in your skull.
I'm not that sort o' girl.
End the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">charmed</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">frightened</LSTag> condition.
Your background and your adventure experience mean that you linked yourself to a plan a long time ago.
A simple pouch containing planar items.
You have detected portal traces of a hag.
The ship's Helm leaves traces of multiple passages across the planes.
You have detected traces of an unstable wizard portal.
You have detected traces of mushroom circles connecting the Underdark and a hag's lair.
You have detected numerous portal traces.
You have detected traces of a portal connecting the Material Plane and a pocket dimension. The key appears to be the mysterious artifact you are carrying.
You have detected evidence of a portal used by some githyanki.
You have detected traces of a portal that could lead to the heart of the shadow curse.
You have detected traces of a portal connecting a cursed prison and the Material Plane. The key seems to be Shar's trials.
You have detected traces of a portal connecting Baldur's Gate circus and a distant jungle.
You have detected traces of a portal connecting the Sorcerous Sundries store and some secret magical rooms.
You have detected traces of a portal connecting the Material Plane and a devil's lair. The key appears to be a ritual composed of multiple objects.
Activating this device grants you some of its knowledge.
If it really is a Mimir, activating it should grant you some of its knowledge, right?
Using this contract allows you to hire the creature linked to it.
Using this contract allows you to hire the creature linked to it.
Prevents casting most teleportation or portal spells.
A magical sword usually associated with good used by the archons of Mount Celestia. It is very rare to come across a mortal holding such a weapon.
A javelin typically used by bariaurs from Ysgard.
When hit by a Barbed Javelin, the target's movement speed is reduced.
The Fire Starters, wielding these flasks, burn away oppressive systems through chaos and flame.
The Fire Starters, wielding these hammers, burn away oppressive systems through chaos and flame.
Since kolyaruts have 4 arms, they very often use 4 of these weapons at the same time.
A weapon used by Harmonium patrollers.
A weapon used for repression by representatives of the Harmonium.
A perfectly proportioned weapon for mustevals.
Cuprilachs strike surgically, following the orders of aurumachs without question or emotion.
Nulls work in the shadows, serving as assassins and spies for the Athar.
These entropic weapons immersed in necrotic energy can turn enemies to ash.
These entropic weapons immersed in necrotic energy can turn enemies to ash.
These entropic weapons immersed in necrotic energy can turn enemies to ash.
